hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4H Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a period of low volatility (Bollinger Band Width < 0.02 on 4H chart) within a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the upper band with volume > 1.5x 20-period average will lead to a continuation move of at least 2.5% within the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral regimes, volatility compression often precedes directional moves. The Bollinger Band squeeze identifies this compression, while volume confirmation filters false breakouts. Neutral regimes lack strong trend bias, making breakouts more significant when they occur.
entry_conditions: Price closes above upper Bollinger Band
Volume on breakout candle > 1.5x 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.stop_loss: 1.5% below entry price OR close back inside Bollinger Bands
exit_conditions.time_exit: 12 hours after entry if TP/SL not hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >2.5% move within 12 hours more than 55% of the time, or more than 40% of signals immediately reverse through stop loss.
